title: Honor

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: so, i lost my honor rank due to getting chat restricted for flaming and it hasn't re-unlocked yet. How long does it usually take to re-unlock and does it go back to what it was at or will i have to get my honor rank back up?

replies.body: It can take a different amount of time for everyone. Playing more honorable games is a good way to have it unlocked sooner!
does it restart or will it start back at level 4?
Depends on the punishment. You'll have to work your way back up the ranks, but the punishment determines whether you drop a rank or all the way to 0 I believe.
i only got chat restricted for 10 games and it was the 1st time i've had a punishment before i've played a lot of games since then and have been honored a lot and still hasn't unlocked again.
